name: Breaking into the design field - Livestream slide deck
description:
A presentation by a panel of early-career designers from Amazon, Grammarly, Google & Squarespace about their design journeys. Watch it here.


Panelists Vanasa Liu, Nasha Torres, Stephanie Liu, and Gabe Cagara share their top tips for how to get the most out of networking, positioning oneself to potential companies, making a portfolio stand out, and shining at an internship.
